data.title: Dodge County Middle School - Eastman
data.meta_description: Dodge County Middle School is a public school in Eastman, Georgia that is part of Dodge County School District. It serves 590 studentsin 6 - 8 with a student/teacher ratio of 12.6:1.Its teachers have had 12 projects funded on DonorsChoose.
data.text:
About this school

Dodge County Middle School is a town public school in Eastman, Georgia that is part of Dodge County School District. It serves 590 students in 6 - 8 with a student/teacher ratio of 12.6:1. Its teachers have had 12 projects funded on DonorsChoose.

Grades Served

6 - 8

Students

590

Teachers

47

Dodge County Middle School Contact info is sourced from our partners at MDR Education, and DonorsChoose updates our site ahead of each school year.

(478) 374-6492

5911 Oak St

Eastman, GA 31023

Website

DonorsChoose is the most trusted classroom funding site for teachers.

As a teacher-founded nonprofit, we're trusted by thousands of teachers and supporters across the country. Each classroom request for funding was created by a classroom teacher and reviewed by the DonorsChoose team.

See how DonorsChoose works

Dodge County Middle School Support on DonorsChoose Last updated Aug 27, 2024

DonorsChoose makes it easy for anyone to help a teacher in need, moving us closer to a nation where students in every community have the tools and experiences they need for a great education.
